name: Mega Bot's Jungle Jam
description:
Thanks for playing Mega Bot's Jungle Jam

This was my first Unity Project that was submitted to the Ryerson IEEE August 2020 Game Jam
The game was inspired by the retro-classic: MegaMan from Capcom and was made within roughly 14 days, 
where I attempted to make as polished of a game as possible; so the overall level content had to suffer 
(in my opinion).  This build of the game being submitted only contains a
portion of what I wanted to implemented and an unfinished boss sequence. Please enjoy!

**DISCLAIMER: ALL ASSETS WERE PROVIDED FROM ROYALTY FREE WEBSITES AND UNITY STORE 
I DO NOT OWN ANY ASSETS USED IN THIS PROJECT**

****CONTROLS****
WASD - Player Movement
SPACEBAR - Jump
C / MSB1 - Shoot
****        ****
